content.title: Grammar
content.description:
Question tags
In English the question tag is formed by inverting the auxiliary verb of main sentence followed by the pronoun.
Examples:
This dish is tasty, isn't it?
You're from London, aren't you?
We have an exam tomorrow, havn't we?
You can sing, can't you?

content.title: Conversation
table: Customer: Hello, I want a haircut.
مشتری: سلام، می‌خواهم موهایم را کوتاه کنم.
Barber: How would you like it?
Customer: Just tidy it up a bit, please.
مشتری: فقط یک کم کوتاهش کنید.
Barber: Your hair is dry. Shall I put some oil in it?
سلمانی: موهای شما خشک است، می‌خواهید کمی روغن به موهایتان بزنم؟
Customer: Yes thanks, Would you please trim my mustache and beard too?
مشتری: بله ممنون. ممکن است ریش و سیبیلم هم مرتب کنید؟

content.title: Grammar
content.description:
negative imperative tense
do not + verb
Example: Don't go! Don't say so!

content.title: Conversation
table: Marjan: I've decided to have my hair premed.
مرجان: من تصمیم دارم موهایم را فر کنم.
ستاره: واقعاً؟ من موهای فر را دوست دارم.
Marjan: I should find a good hair stylist.
مرجان: باید یک آرایشگر خوب پیدا کنم.

content.title: Common Phrases
table: I want a skin treatment, please.
Please cut and blow-dry my hair.
لطفاً موهای من را کوتاه کنید و سشوار بکشید.
How long will I have to wait?

content.title: Reading
content.description: Isfahan is one of the largest cities in Iran. This city is located in central Iran. Through the center of Isfahan flows a river by the name Zayanderud. This beautiful and historical city has many historical monuments. Most of these monuments are listed by UNESCO. The city Isfahan has a large city square by name "Naqsh-e Jahan". This square is one of the largest city squares in the world.
